Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' compared to 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all rejection activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' that are followed by 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' from all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in relation to total number of declarations submitted
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' followed by 'Request Payment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Request Payment'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' by 'STAFF MEMBER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' that lead to a new submission by the same employee
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in cases where the budget owner and supervisor are the same person
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in the process variants where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' occurs
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in relation to 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in cases leading to 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' in cases without 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' does not happen

Name: Percentage reduction of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' as a result of interventions aimed at reducing 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: the average of the function base < 0 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' per year
Metric: Number of 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' activities
